newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares seen flat or up slightly Thursday.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares seen flat or up slightly Thursday.

text.p: Polish shares were expected to maintain their flat trend as next week's Bank Handlowy's public offering, seen overall at about $1 billion, countered a generally good macroeconomic mood.
Analysts said Wednesday's higher turnover and stronger post-price-fixing buying could signal a gain on Thursday.
They said Espebepe could extend this week's surge after creditors last Friday accepted the firm's version of a debt write-off deal, though profit-taking loomed.
Food producer PEPEES starts trade on the main market on Thursday. -- Steven Silber +48 22 653 9700
